items/mines/deep_earth/crystal/descripti: A shard of crystal. Used in crafting recipes.
items/mines/deep_earth/crystal_berries/d: These berries have a glasslike appearance and are very sweet.
items/mines/deep_earth/crystal_rose/desc: This delicate, shimmering rose appears to be made of crystal.
items/mines/deep_earth/crystal_wing_moth: A rare Deep Earth insect. Their delicate wings reflect the light and make them sparkle.
items/mines/deep_earth/crystalline_crick: A common Deep Earth insect. The stones around it vibrate in tune with its song.
items/mines/deep_earth/deep_earthworm/de: An uncommon Deep Earth insect. It's completely unlike its surface-dwelling cousin... if you're a worm expert.
items/mines/deep_earth/earth_eel/descrip: A common medium Deep Earth fish. Doesn't seem to have a mouth, so who knows what it eats.
items/mines/deep_earth/earth_infused_sto: An uncommon artifact. This chunk of rock has taken on elemental qualities of earth.
items/mines/deep_earth/earthshroom/descr: These mushrooms grow in dense clusters, and smell strongly of earth.
items/mines/deep_earth/emerald_horned_ch: A rare large Deep Earth fish. This large fish is nearly all horn, which seems to be made of pure emerald.
items/mines/deep_earth/faceted_rock_gem/: A uncommon artifact. Despite its mesmerizing, gem-like appearance, it's just a piece of rock.
items/mines/deep_earth/gem_shard_caterpi: An uncommon Deep Earth insect. It seems to feed on crystal berries.
items/mines/deep_earth/pebble_minnow/des: A common small Deep Earth fish. The scales of these fish have taken on a pebbled texture to help it blend into its surroundings.
items/mines/deep_earth/really_round_rock: A common artifact. This naturally formed stone is unnaturally round.
items/mines/deep_earth/rock_roach/descri: An uncommon Deep Earth insect. It's cuter than you'd expect.
items/mines/deep_earth/rock_statue/descr: A rare artifact. This naturally formed stone appears to be in the shape of a human, but... surely it's just a coincidence.
items/mines/deep_earth/rockbiter/descrip: An uncommon medium Deep Earth fish. This fish has an over-developed jaw to help it grind down stone.
items/mines/deep_earth/rockroot/descript: It's hard to tell if this is part of a living plant or if it just resembles one.
items/mines/deep_earth/seriously_square_: A common artifact. This naturally formed stone is a perfect square, a true delight for a rock connoisseur.
items/mines/deep_earth/shale_grass/descr: This grass only looks like it's made of rock. Very tough to cut.
items/mines/deep_earth/shardfin/descript: An uncommon small Deep Earth fish. This fish's sleek fin has an iridescent shimmer.
items/mines/lava_caves/ash_mushroom/desc: A delicate mushroom that releases ashlike spores when jostled.
items/mines/lava_caves/breath_of_fire/de: These beautiful flowers continue to glow, even after they've been picked.
items/mines/lava_caves/flame_pepper/desc: These incredibly hot peppers should be handled with care.
items/mines/lava_caves/hot_potato/descri: This pre-cooked wild potato has a spicy flavor and creamy texture.
items/mines/lava_caves/lava_chestnuts/de: These delicious chestnuts come pre-cooked! A great snack, but smells a bit like sulfur.
items/mines/ruins/essence_blossom/descri: A flower infused with magic, beautiful and surprisingly resilient.
items/mines/ruins/spell_fruit/descriptio: A fruit with a mouthwatering aroma that's quite mesmerizing.
items/mines/tide_caverns/archerfish/desc: An uncommon small Tide Caverns fish. It squirts a stream of water to catch bugs.
items/mines/tide_caverns/cave_kelp/descr: This seaweed makes a great thickener for soups. Used in a variety of cooking recipes.
items/mines/tide_caverns/coral/descripti: A pretty piece of coral. Typically found in the Tide Caverns, this material can be used in a variety of crafting recipes.
items/mines/tide_caverns/coral_mantis/de: An uncommon Tide Caverns insect. Its camouflage has turned this mantis into a work of art.
items/mines/tide_caverns/crab_statue/des: A rare artifact. This delicately crafted statue almost seems alive.
items/mines/tide_caverns/dense_water/des: An uncommon artifact. This water is so dense that it holds its shape even in air.
items/mines/tide_caverns/hermit_snail/de: An uncommon Tide Caverns insect. Decorates its shell with sand and brightly colored pebbles.
items/mines/tide_caverns/mines_mussels/d: These mussels grow in bunches underground. Used in a variety of cooking recipes.
items/mines/tide_caverns/mini_whale_shar: A rare large Tide Caverns fish. Despite its name, it is still very large.
items/mines/tide_caverns/puddle_spider/d: An rare Tide Caverns insect. Seems to use the vibrations on puddles to hunt.
items/mines/tide_caverns/sapphire_betta/: A common small Tide Caverns fish. It has a lovely color.
items/mines/tide_caverns/sea_grapes/desc: These grapes have a salty pop that adds a briny taste to any dish. Used in a variety of cooking recipes.
items/mines/tide_caverns/sea_scarab/desc: An uncommon Tide Caverns insect. Its pretty carapace looks like the sea on a sunny day.
items/mines/tide_caverns/starlight_coral: A common artifact. This piece of coral glimmers as if reflecting starlight.
items/mines/tide_caverns/stone_shell/des: A common artifact. When you hold it to your ear, you can hear the sound of water flowing through deep caves.
items/mines/tide_caverns/tide_lettuce/de: This wild lettuce has a rich flavor and a satisfying crunch. Used in a variety of cooking recipes.
items/mines/tide_caverns/tidestone/descr: An uncommon artifact. This chunk of stone appears to grow and shrink slightly along with the tides.
items/mines/tide_caverns/transparent_jel: A common medium Tide Caverns invertebrate. It evolved in darkness, resulting in an unusual transparent appearance.
items/mines/tide_caverns/underseaweed/de: This seaweed has a mild flavor and bouncy texture. Used in a variety of cooking recipes.
items/mines/tide_caverns/water_balloon_f: An uncommon medium Tide Caverns fish. It takes in an impressive amount of water to discourage predators.
items/mines/tide_caverns/waterfly/descri: A common Tide Caverns insect. Like its firefly cousin, it uses its blue glow to signal.
items/mines/upper_mines/cave_eel/descrip: An uncommon medium Upper Mines fish. They build nests out of stone.
items/mines/upper_mines/cave_shark/descr: A rare large Upper Mines fish. How did they end up in the Mines?!
items/mines/upper_mines/cave_shrimp/desc: A common small Upper Mines crustacean. Its translucent body gives it a distinct appearance.
items/mines/upper_mines/copper_beetle/de: An uncommon Upper Mines insect. Their unique coloration is great camouflage.
items/mines/upper_mines/lantern_moth/des: A common Upper Mines insect. They gather near light sources in dark places.
items/mines/upper_mines/mine_cricket/des: A rare Upper Mines insect. Their songs are kinda catchy...
items/mines/upper_mines/miners_helmet/de: A rare artifact. There is a worn away name on it that ends with the letter L...
items/mines/upper_mines/miners_pickaxe/d: A common artifact. It's in pretty good condition despite its age.
items/mines/upper_mines/miners_rucksack/: An uncommon artifact. It seems to have been down in the Mines a long time.
items/mines/upper_mines/miners_slab/desc: An uncommon artifact. It appears to warn of pitfalls ahead.
items/mines/upper_mines/narrows_moss/des: A unique species of moss. Very exciting to moss experts.
items/mines/upper_mines/rock_guppy/descr: An uncommon small Upper Mines fish. Very similar to a regular guppy.
items/mines/upper_mines/shadow_flower/de: A rare flower that only grows in darkness. It makes a unique gift.
items/mines/upper_mines/stone_loach/desc: A common medium Upper Mines fish. They easily blend in with the surrounding rocks.
items/mines/upper_mines/sweetroot/descri: A root that grows in caves underground. Makes a great snack, even when eaten raw!
items/mines/upper_mines/tin_lunchbox/des: A common artifact. Sadly, it's empty.
items/mines/upper_mines/tunnel_millipede: An uncommon Upper Mines insect. Their many legs make quick work of tunneling.
items/mines/upper_mines/upper_mines_mush: A wild mushroom with a great flavor and texture. Commonly used as a cooking ingredient.
items/mines/upper_mines/worm/description: An uncommon Upper Mines invertebrate. It's just a worm.
